fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Mark a player with the power of friendship each day.
- Unmark a player with the power of spite each day.
- Instantly deal an Unstoppable attack to a target during the day and reveal your role. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask.
- If two or more marked players would die at night, their marks are consumed and they live instead.
- Your last ability can only be used if all alive players are marked, and will unmark all players.
